settings.title: Settings
settings.explanationDesc: Learn about each setting option below
settings.onlyPlusesExplanation: When enabled, only addition problems will be generated. When disabled, both addition and subtraction problems are included.
settings.shuffleExplanation: Randomly changes the order of digits in each problem to increase difficulty and prevent pattern memorization.
settings.speedExplanation: Controls how fast each number appears during the iteration flow. Slower speeds give more time to process each number.
settings.digitExplanation: Sets the maximum number of digits for each number in the problems (e.g., 3 digits = numbers up to 999).
settings.questionsExplanation: Determines how many numbers will appear in each practice session.
settings.separatorExplanation: When enabled, displays thousands separators in numbers (e.g., 1234 becomes 1,234) for easier reading.
settings.notifyExplanation: When enabled, plays 2 beep sounds before starting each session to help you prepare and focus.

customOptions.rangeWord: Enter a value between 100 and 30000. (1000 = 1 second)
customOptions.insertBigger: Small digit must be less than big digit.

problemList.checkProbDesc: Review all calculation problems and answers from your session.
problemList.burningModeEnabled: Burning mode enabled. Now it will continue infinitely without stop.
problemList.burningModeDisabled: Burning mode disabled. Now it will stop after the set number of questions.
